channel.title: Learning java
channel.description: i might be a fucking idiot for posting this but i want to learn java, and when i searched i couldnt find any good tuts on here could someone post good links? i went to www.java.com and couldnt find anything as well if i fail then i guess i fail :|

item.title: Learning java
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Squigglyo, post:8, topic:251978”]be that as it may,

how general must a question be to qualify for General Discussion? Where is the line?
The question was not specifically about anything to do with java, more about the location of documents about java. A generalized question about the subject.

My logic was that it was a general question about java. so it qualified for both Java, and General.[/quote]General section is for stuff not found in other sections.

Read full topic

item.description:

Fucking learn to post in the correct sections

Its just as General as all the other threads in this god forsaken waste land we call the General Discussion forum

but i can see how asking a simple question about a programming language could have offended you so greatly
[/quote]Pretty sure there’s a Java section for a reason.[/quote]
And a sticky with a fuckton of links to java tutorials.

item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/
Take a look at that one, then google some more. Maybe even better - find some ebooks on java.

item.title: Learning java
item.dc:creator: @Squigglyo Squigglyo
item.description:
@Squigglyo wrote:

Learn 2 google? i found and read like 20 tuts in the space of 30 mins when i was learning java… there out there… you just gotta look… not even that hard, just look.
Google ‘Java Tutorial’… i know its a long shot, but one of the 520,000 sites that it produces might just infact have a Tutorial on Java
